item.title: Emacs Configuration Overview
item.description: Intro Post So I Can Share Code Chunks From My Emacs Initialization File In Order Here are some notes about how I set-up my emacs config, how I used to set it up, and what areas I’m still working on. As mentioned before, other text editors in use today, like Atom, IntelliJ Idea, or WebStorm are awesome, and offer also cool unique packages. For example, Atom has some super useful snippet packages.
